scripts.build: dotenv -e ../../.env -- sh -c 'PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS=rhel-openssl-3.0.x PRISMA_LOG_QUERIES=true DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_SITE1 npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma && ls -l node_modules/.prisma/client/ || { echo "No binary in auth"; exit 1; } && tsc && esbuild src/functions/trpc.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/functions/trpc.js --external:@prisma/client && rm -f dist/functions/*.d.ts dist/functions/*.map && mkdir -p dist/functions/prisma/client && cp -r node_modules/.prisma/client/* dist/functions/prisma/client/ && ls -l dist/functions/prisma/client/ || { echo "No files in dist/functions/prisma/client/"; exit 1; } && echo "Copied Prisma client and binary to dist/functions/prisma/client/"'
scripts.prisma: dotenv -e ../../.env -- sh -c 'PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS=rhel-openssl-3.0.x PRISMA_LOG_QUERIES=true DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_SITE1 npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma && ls -l node_modules/.prisma/client/ || echo "No binary in auth"'
